item.description:
Incubators fear not, although the evil Shredder has returned, we have the laughter alongside colored bandanas over our eyes, green skin, and turtle shells to defeat him.

Seriously if you come to the Incubator this week, I cannot promise that you won't turn into a turtle but the odds of it happening are pretty absurdly high and ridiculous. In other words, that shouldn't keep you from checking out another fun week of improv games to get you moving, shaking, improv-ing, and improving your ninja improv skills and abilities.

Unrequired homework: YouTube Vanilla Ice's Ninja Rap

Go Ninja Go Ninja Go!! I look forward to seeing you there. And that includes anyone who hasn't been yet, we have a ton of peeps signed up for this group, so come check it out. We offer a very relaxed atmosphere and don't bite we just.....

NINJA VANISH!!!!!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my own clothing!
item.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Cambridge Improv Incubators II: The Secret of the Laughter
